entry.title: Running schema migrations on Heroku
entry.summary: This is a quick article on how schema migrations are run beforing deploying your Go application(or any another app) on Heroku. I’ve myself faced some problems due to lack of proper documentation with the Go buildpack. A bunch of SO threads have helped me pave the correct path. So let’s start. What you need An application server That’s it. Preferrably add // +heroku goVersion go1.15 after...
